Description: Fragment of the oval bowl of an ivory spoon with flat base and angled outer walls.
Curator's comments: The fragmentary handle of this spoon is registered as EA59696.
Bibliographic references: Brunton & Caton-Thompson 1928 / The Badarian Civilisation and Predynastic Remains near Badari (pl. xxvi.1; xxii.6)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
